experiences.title: News Reader Website
desc: NewsRabbit is api based web application.
It provide news of all categories like sports, politics, technology, entertainment etc.
Technology used : ReactJs, News API, Bootstrap5.

experiences.title: A Note Taking App
desc: I made this application with great UI.
t is used to store notes, we can create notes which can be read, update or delete anytime.
Technology used : ReactJS, NodeJS, ExpressJs , MongoDB.

experiences.title: A Text Manipulator
desc: It can be used to do multiple task like remove blank spaces,count words,converting text into uppercase or lowercase and many more.
